name: Quackventure (stephendoesnothing)
description:
Quackventure is a game about a shape-shifting mother-duck who lost her ducklings and is now on a quest to find them!

Embark on an exciting journey filled with dangers to save them!

Do you have what it takes...?

Credits

Music by  SandwichCow#2704

Submission for Mini Jam 111: Colors2   //Also happens to be my first game-jam!

PS: Thank you so so so much for playing this kind stranger!
